recommendations: Ulisse Dell'Orto “Akand is a brilliant individual. He has the unique ability of supporting teams at the technical level when needed, and engaging directly with customers to support the sales efforts. Jack of all trades. He is very creative and he has a very advanced understanding of Blockchain technology and the overall space. He is naturally very curious and a fast learner. I would definitely recommend Akand to any company and believe that he would add tremendous value”

Andy Waterhouse “Akand was part of my team at Chainalysis. He is highly motivated, incredibly hard working and a committed team player, always wanting to add value to the team but particularly to his customers. He thinks about the technology, how it is applied and also how it creates value for the customer and then executes against the vision. His energy levels are contagious. He gets the job done and is always smiling !”

organizations.title: Biofest 2012
organizations.description: o Organized and structured the first ever edition of BioFest with a participation of over 600 students.o Headed a team of 35 students to organize 12 events.o Conceptualized 5 new BioTech events which were never implemented before in a college fest.o Impressed with the quality of the events, sponsors offered to support for an additional two years.

organizations.title: Al Gore Sustainable Technology Venture Competition 2011
organizations.description: o Headed a team of five coordinators under Prof. Oopali Operajita, a professor from Carnegie Mellon.o Increased the sponsorship amount from 50,000 in the previous edition to 350,000 INR.o Doubled the number of participation by implementing new publicity strategies.

organizations.title: Social Innovation Challenge, Shaastra Impact, Shaastra 2011
organizations.description: o Contacted Climate Healers, NGO and made sure the solution/product (solar cooker) was implemented in Rajasthan for societal benefit.

organizations.title: National Services Scheme - Environmentally Conscious Group
organizations.description: o Headed a team of 20 students and organized 5 humanitarian activities throughout the year.o Includes a beach clean-up and teaching in rural schools for 5 days in and around Ongole,AP.

organizations.title: Project X, Shaastra 2010
organizations.description: o Crowd pulling event - Managed 900 people over 3 days for over 5 hours.o Designed a problem statement involving windmills which made the event specific sponsor (Vestas Wind Systems) to increase prize money from 18,000 INR in the previous edition to 40,000 INR.

organizations.title: Sustainability Network, IIT Madras
organizations.description: o Runners up in Inter Hostel Sustainability Competition under Tech-Soc.o Drafted a report on total electricity consumption of the hostel and suggested various green ways of reducing the wastage (Including LED tube lights which were implemented in the hostel).
